thread.title: Arun Vijay Injured in Chakravyuha's Climax
thread.title_full: Arun Vijay Injured in Chakravyuha's Climax

title: Arun Vijay Injured in Chakravyuha's Climax
text:
Photos 
Actor Arun Vijay got injured during the climax shoot of Chakravyuha when he was working with Puneeth Rajkumar. The crew was shooting at Hosur when Arun twisted a twist during a stunt scene,” said producer Lohith NK. “It was for an action sequence being canned for the climax, which we have planned as a really big spectacle. By mistake, he jumped before his designated timing and injured his leg. We immediately took him to a nearby hospital and got him First-Aid. Doctor has told us not to worry but has advised him two days of bed rest,” said Lohith. 
The makers of Chakravyuha directed by Sarvanan are going briskly on with their shoot and if all goes well, the talky portions of the film will be completed by November 10. The film also sees Rachita Ram as the female lead.
